step1.para: Chock wheels. Open hood.
Remove turbocharger intake duct.
Disconnect air compressor intake hose at air filter assembly, if applicable.
Remove complete air filter assembly.
Remove charge air pipe at turbocharger and charge air cooler.
Disconnect exhaust pipe at turbocharger.
Remove turbo oil lines.
Remove crankcase breather vent pipe for access.
Remove bolts retaining exhaust manifold.
Remove manifold with turbocharger attached.
Remove manifold gasket.
On bench, remove turbocharger from exhaust manifold and discard turbo gasket.
Clean manifold to cylinder head and manifold to turbo mating surfaces.
Install turbocharger and new gasket to manifold.

note.para: For installation purposes, install new manifold (3-piece) with the ends loose to the middle section. Tighten ends to center section when manifold is positioned on cylinder head.

step1.para: Position exhaust manifold/turbo assembly and new gasket to cylinder head.
Install manifold bolts and torque to spec.
Install crankcase breather vent pipe.
Install turbo oil lines and gasket.
Connect exhaust pipe at turbocharger.
Install charge air pipe at turbocharger and charge air cooler.
Install complete air filter assembly.
Connect air compressor intake hose at air filter assembly.
Install turbocharger intake duct.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
